name: RevolveWare
description:
RevolveWare is a quickly accelerating minigame compilation inspired by games such as WarioWare!

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 compo, with the theme "stuck in a loop"

All the minigames feature round, spinning, turning or, loopy things. And they keep coming forever until you lose your three lives. There are four minigames with three difficulties that it cycles through, and one boss minigame that appears every 15 minigame. The game speeds up every five minigames and turns into quite a challenge after a while.

CONTROLS:
The arrow keys

I regret that I didn’t have enough time to implement more minigames, but I feel like there is enough variety in there to last for a while if you’re trying for a high score.

Feel free to post your highest score in the comments!

My highest score is 116, try to beat that!
